mapper.sql: select situation, user_code, use_time, is_insurance, day_start, day_end, discount_Price, final_price, car_code from rent

insert into rent(situation, user_code, use_time, is_insurance, day_start, day_end, discount_Price, final_price, car_code) values(#{situation}, #{userCode.userCode}, #{userTime}, #{isInsurance}, #{dayStart}, #{dayEnd}, #{discountPrice}, #{finalPrice}, #{carCode.carCode})

update rent set situation = #{situation}, user_code= #{userCode.userCode}, use_time= #{userTime}, is_insurance= #{isInsurance}, day_start= #{dayStart}, day_end= #{dayEnd}, discount_Price= #{discountPrice}, final_price= #{finalPrice}, car_code = #{carCode.carCode}
mapper.select: select rent_code, situation, car_data.car_code, car_name, car_old, is_auto, car_seater, fuel_code, use_time, is_insurance, day_start, day_end, discount_Price, final_price from rent join car_data on rent.car_code = car_data.car_code where user_code = #{userCode.userCode} and day_start >= #{dayStart} and day_end <= #{dayEnd} order by day_start
mapper.delete: where use_time = #{userTime} and final_price = #{finalPrice} and car_code = #{carCode.carCode}
mapper.select: select rent_code, car_model, manufacturer_name, car_name, sum(use_time), sum(discount_price), sum(final_price) from car_data join manufacturer on car_data.manufacturer_code = manufacturer.manufacturer_code join car_model on car_data.car_model_code = car_model.car_model_code join rent on car_data.car_code = rent.car_code group by car_model union select rent_code, '합계', '-', '-', sum(use_time), sum(discount_price), sum(final_price) from rent

select rent_code, car_model, manufacturer_name, car_name, sum(use_time), sum(discount_price), sum(final_price) from car_data join manufacturer on car_data.manufacturer_code = manufacturer.manufacturer_code join car_model on car_data.car_model_code = car_model.car_model_code join rent on car_data.car_code = rent.car_code where day_start >= #{param1} and day_end <= #{param2} group by car_model union select 0, '합계', '-', '-', sum(use_time), sum(discount_price), sum(final_price) from rent where day_start >= #{param1} and day_end <= #{param2}

select rent_code, car_model, manufacturer_name, car_name, sum(use_time), sum(discount_price), sum(final_price) from car_data join manufacturer on car_data.manufacturer_code = manufacturer.manufacturer_code join car_model on car_data.car_model_code = car_model.car_model_code join rent on car_data.car_code = rent.car_code join user on user.user_code = rent.user_code where gender = #{param1} group by car_model union select 0,'합계', '-', '-', sum(use_time), sum(discount_price), sum(final_price) from rent join user on rent.user_code = user.user_code where gender = #{param1}

select rent_code, car_model, manufacturer_name, car_name, sum(use_time), sum(discount_price), sum(final_price) from car_data join manufacturer on car_data.manufacturer_code = manufacturer.manufacturer_code join car_model on car_data.car_model_code = car_model.car_model_code join rent on car_data.car_code = rent.car_code where car_model = #{param1} group by car_name union select 0, '합계', '-', '-', sum(use_time), sum(discount_price), sum(final_price) from car_data join rent on rent.car_code = car_data.car_code join car_model on car_data.car_model_code = car_model.car_model_code where car_model = #{param1}

select rent_code, car_model, manufacturer_name, car_name, sum(use_time), sum(discount_price), sum(final_price) from car_data join manufacturer on car_data.manufacturer_code = manufacturer.manufacturer_code join car_model on car_data.car_model_code = car_model.car_model_code join rent on car_data.car_code = rent.car_code where manufacturer_name = #{param1} group by car_name union select 0, '합계', '-', '-', sum(use_time), sum(discount_price), sum(final_price) from car_data join rent on rent.car_code = car_data.car_code join manufacturer on car_data.manufacturer_code = manufacturer.manufacturer_code where manufacturer_name = #{param1}
